title: PRICE DROP: N172 Old Judge Ned Williamson - SGC 30 - nice image
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: PRICE DROP: N172 Old Judge Ned Williamson - SGC 30 - nice image
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am selling the pictured Old Judge N172 of Ned Williamson - pose 512-3c (if I'm not mistaken).  Interesting fact - Williamson led the league in homers in 1884 with 27, but never had more than 9 in any other year of his 13-year career.  He also had 49 doubles in 1883, but his next highest total was 27.  

The card is graded SGC 30 - it has a solid front with no creases and nice corners, but has been downgraded due to the tape staining on the back.

Price is $[STRIKE]195[/STRIKE] $170 delivered - PayPal gift or check preferred but any form accepted.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for looking!
Scott

Knocking it down to $170 delivered - thanks for looking...

Scott
